summary: A test suite that validates the Kandinsky V2.2 combined image‑to‑image pipeline, checking model loading, serialization, callback handling, output consistency across formats, mixed‑precision inference, batch vs single processing, CPU offloading, and optional component management.
business_intent: Guarantee that the Kandinsky V2.2 img2img pipeline operates correctly and efficiently in production environments by detecting regressions, confirming resource‑offload strategies, and ensuring reliable model persistence and inference behavior.
